Event.name: Agriculture
Event.definition:
<def-root>In this frame an <fen>Agriculturist</fen> cultivates <fen>Food</fen>. The location or <fen>Ground</fen> where the <fen>Food</fen> is cultivated by the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> is often expressed.
<ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Agriculturist">Peasants</fex> were encouraged to <t>cultivate</t> <fex name="Food">basic food crops such as beans and corn</fex></ex>.
<ex><fex name="Food">Shrimp</fex> <t>farming</t> seems to be a recipe for disaster</ex>
<ex><fex name="Ground">Some fields</fex> were probably <t>cultivated</t> <fex name="Time">only in the dry season</fex> <fex name="Agriculturist">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Food
Arg.definition:
<def-root><fex name="Food">Food</fex> is the item cultivated by the <fen>Agriculturist</fen>.
<ex>They <t>cultivate</t> <fex name="Food">fungi</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Instrument</fen> is used by the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> as a tool to help obtain <fen>Food</fen>. (This tool is not limited to typical artifacts and can be hands, arms, and other atypical hunting and fishing instruments.) </def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition:
<def-root>For what length of time the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> attempted to obtain <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> cultivates <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Outcome
Arg.definition: <def-root>The failure or success of an attempt. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The greater geographic location where the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> cultivates <fen>Food</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>An action that the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> intends to accomplish by cultivating <fen>Food</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This frame element selects some gradable attribute and modifies the expected value for it.
<ex>Most of lowland Britain is <fex name="Degree">intensively</fex> <t>cultivated</t>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Ground
Arg.definition:
<def-root>This is the the background or context for the <fen>Food</fen> to which the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> pays attention in his agricultural efforts.
<ex>Romans were <t>cultivating</t> <fex name="Ground">the land</fex> in Northern Gaul.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

Arg.name: Type
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the subtype of agriculture that the <fen>Agriculturist</fen> is engaging in.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>Circumstances describe the state of the world (at a particular time and place) which is specifically independent of the agricultural event itself and any of its participants.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: cultivate.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: foster crop growth from the land

lexUnit.name: farming.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of cultivating the land and raising animals

lexUnit.name: farm.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to use land for growing crops and raising animals
